Sentence.Translation: [0]你的房子真棒，格拉汉姆夫人。[1]“真棒”？你指的什么？[2]感觉很古典。[3]屋里的每一样东西看起来都像是手工制作的……[4]你们这些孩子！总是用想象代替亲眼所见[5]的东西。电视看多了吧，什么“像是”！[6]这里的所有东西不是看起来而已，本来就是[7]手工制作的。[8]真的？[9]当然！[10]哇！简直不可思议！[11]好了，你来找我干嘛，阿修蕾？[12]我来向你道谢。[13]也就是说你做好药了？[14]是的！[15]找纯净水花了很多功夫，不过最终[16]还是都弄好了。[17]而且马修也都喝下去了。[18]他当然要喝下去！[19]嘛，总归是个好消息。[20]小不点的烧很快就会退了。[21]我开的处方不会错的。[22]我真的十分感谢你的帮助，格拉汉姆夫人。[23]哦，对了，还要谢谢你让我用这个。[24]不客气，孩子。[25]格拉汉姆夫人……[26]我其实还有一些事想要问你。[27]你有事问我？[28]嗯……是的……[29]那就问吧。[30]可以吗？[31]不过首先让我先问几个问题，[32]如果可以的话。[33]当然可以。[34]你多大了，阿修蕾？[35]十六岁。[36]那个男孩，叫马修，他十三岁？[37]是的。[38]我们是今天才认识的。[39]等一下，阿修蕾……[40]你来我这求药，就是为了今天刚认识[41]的人？[42]啊，是。[43]他孤身一人，我不能丢下他不管……[44]孤身一人是什么意思？[45]他是自己来这的。[46]干嘛，为了玩？[47]不，不是为了玩。[48]他在找他的爸爸。他说他爸爸就是在[49]这失踪的。[50]我明白了。[51]我答应过，今天他可以四处寻找线索，[52]如果什么都没找到，[53]他就会回到他的[54]叔叔家。[55]他叔叔家？[56]你难道是在暗示他的双亲都[57]失踪了？[58]嗯……[59]他的妈妈得病后去世了，妹妹[60]被带去了其他地方。[61]真让人痛心……可怜的孩子。[62]阿修蕾，看来你是被卷入[63]困境[64]了。[65]

Sentence.Translation: [0]阿修蕾，我要确认一件事。[1]什么事？[2]为什么你这么坚持帮助马修寻找他的[3]父亲呢？[4]听起来你应该有什么特别的理由。[5]到底为什么？[6]我……能体会到他的心情。[7]你能体会？[8]两年前，我也曾孤身一人去找过[9]爸爸……[10]而且马修的妈妈在他还是很小的时候就[11]去世了。[12]就像我妈妈一样。[13]这么说来你的遭遇也很辛苦。[14]嗯。[15]所以我清楚地知道他的感受。[16]他可能有点自私，也有点莽撞，不过我知道[17]他内心一定很孤独。[18]他才十三岁啊。[19]难道不该有人在一旁帮助他吗？[20]嗯……所以你就去帮他了？[21]是。[22]我会陪着他。[23]看来，你在他身边一定能提供不少[24]帮助。[25]嗯，我也希望如此。[26]格拉汉姆夫人，你也是一个人住在这吧？[27]是。我一个人住。[28]你不觉得孤独吗？[29]你不想有人来[30]陪你吗？[31]如果要说从不孤独那是撒谎。[32]不过……[33]不过？[34]当我静静地守在这座房子里的时候，又觉得[35]并不是完全一个人。[36]为什么？[37]你太年轻了，阿修蕾。你不会懂的。[38]或许等你也变老了……[39]人们都是生活总是于回忆相伴的，每一分[40]每一秒。[41]回忆？[42]是啊。[43]好啦，我已经耽误你不少时间了……[44]你打算问我什么？[45]嗯，我想请你帮忙，[46]其实……[47]嗯？[48]我想进去钟楼。[49]钟楼？[50]是的……[51]你到底想去[52]那种地方干什么[53]？[54]

Sentence.Original: [0]I want to find out about what happened five[1]years ago.[2]We think that there might be some clues[3]about Matt's dad's disappearance.[4]He disappeared five years ago, you say?[5]Yeah.[6]His mom said that he should never go to the[7]clock tower.[8]But we think there has to be a reason for that.[9]Maybe something happened.[10]You might be right...[11]Huh?[12]Ashley, say you do go and look inside...[13]And Matt finds out something he didn't want to[14]know, then what?[15]What do you mean?[16]Don't you know why the clock tower stopped?[17]Yeah, Lucy told me.[18]Then maybe you shouldn't go in there.[19]What if the rumour is true, and it turns out[20]that Matt's father was the one who fell?[21]Mrs Graham, even so, I want to go in there.[22]And why is that?[23]Two years ago, I had no idea why Mom had died.[24]And I was scared of finding out...[25]But when I found out, I understood.[26]Finding out the truth is really scary, sure, but[27]it's better than the other option.[28]I think that the worst thing is never knowing[29]the truth, no matter how hard it is.[30]Ashley...[31]That's why I want to go in there.[32]
Sentence.Translation: [0]我想搞清楚五年前到底发生了[1]什么。[2]我们觉得那可能会有马修爸爸[3]失踪的线索。[4]你说他五年前失踪的？[5]嗯。[6]她的妈妈要他不要接近[7]钟楼。[8]不过这一定是有理由的。[9]或许那发生过什么事。[10]你或许是对的……[11]嗯？[12]阿修蕾，假如你们真的进去看了……[13]而且发现了马修不想知道的事情，[14]你会怎么办？[15]你是指什么？[16]你难道不知道钟楼为什么关闭了吗？[17]知道，露西告诉我了。[18]那你或许就不该去那儿。[19]假如谣言是真的，而马修的父亲正是那个[20]从钟楼掉下来的人，事情会变成什么样？[21]格拉汉姆夫人，即使有这个可能，我也要进去。[22]为什么这么坚持？[23]两年前，我并不知道妈妈为何而死。[24]我也很害怕知道……[25]可一切真相大白后，我明白了。[26]探寻真相确实让人感到害怕，但是[27]也比另一种选择好。[28]我觉得不论真相本身有多残酷，对其一无所知[29]才是最糟的情况。[30]阿修蕾……[31]所以我一定要进去看看。[32]

Sentence.Original: [0]I didn't find the key, but I did find this.[1]It was in a photo album in the cupboard. This[2]envelope was tucked into the cover.[3]An envelope?[4]I had no idea there was anything in that album.[5]I think it's for you. It has your name on it.[6]Ashley...[7]I...can't open this. Could you open it for me,[8]please?[9]Are you sure?[10]Yes.[11]There's...a letter and a key inside.[12]You couldn't read out that letter to me, could[13]you?[14]I've broken my glasses, so I wouldn't be able to[15]make out the letters.[16]"To my dearest Mom,[17]I'm leaving this letter behind with the hope that[18]one day you'll read it.[19]Mom, I'm so sorry for making you worry so[20]much about me.[21]I know that you were just really worried for me[22]because I fell in love again after the divorce,[23]and I'm really grateful and lucky to have you[24]there for me like that.[25]But, with Gilbert, this time I know it's not just a[26]fling or a fantasy. My feelings are real, and I'm[27]determined to spend the rest of my life with[28]him. I left this letter in his album with the hope[29]you'll look at his photos and understand how I[30]feel. Mom, no matter how far away I go, I will[31]never ever forget the sound of the clock tower[32]ringing. The sound you loved so much.[33]I pray that one day you'll find it in your heart[34]to forgive us and accept me and Gilbert.[35]All my love,[36]Your daughter, Olivia.[37].....[38]Maybe you should have this. Here...[39]Thank you, Ashley.[40]
Sentence.Translation: [0]我没有找到要是，不过发现了这个。[1]在橱柜的相册里发现的。这封信被[2]塞进封页里了。[3]一封信？[4]我从不知道相册里有这种东西。[5]我想这是寄给你的。上面有你的名字。[6]阿修蕾……[7]我……不能打开这封信。你能帮我拆开[8]吗？[9]可以吗？[10]嗯。[11]里面……有一页信和一把钥匙。[12]能请你读给我听[13]吗？[14]我的眼睛摔坏了，所以没办法自己看[15]信的内容了。[16]“最亲爱的妈妈，[17]我希望有一天你会读到[18]这封信。[19]妈妈，让你一直以来如此担心我，[20]我很内疚。[21]我知道自己在离婚后再次恋爱[22]让你很担忧，[23]我很感激你挂念我的这种[24]心情。[25]可是我这次对吉尔伯特并非是情窦初开[26]的一时冲动。我对他的感情是真实的，[27]我已决定要和他一起度过余生。[28]我之所以把这封信留在他的摄影集里，[29]是希望终有一天你能看看他的作品，理解我的[30]感受。妈妈，不论走到天涯海角，我都不会忘记[31]那自钟楼响起的钟声。[32]你曾如此喜爱的钟声。[33]我祈望终有一天您能在心里真的原谅我们，[34]接受我和吉尔伯特的婚姻。[35]致我最亲爱的妈妈，[36]你的女儿，奥利维亚。[37]……[38]或许你应该收下这封信……[39]谢谢，阿修蕾。[40]

Sentence.Original: [0]What do you mean?[1]Well, I was always dead against her getting[2]married to that photographer man.[3]And still, she wanted me to see his photos...[4]So she went and left an album of his in her[5]room.[6]Silly girl should have known that I wouldn't go[7]near that cabinet with his stuff in it.[8]Not even a thought spared about [9]her mother's[10]feelings[11]...[12]
Sentence.Translation: [0]你是指？[1]我一直是坚决反对她和那个摄影师[2]结婚的。[3]即便如此，她还是想着我能看看他的作品……[4]所以她走的时候在房间里留下了一本[5]摄影集。[6]这个傻孩子应该知道我根本不会接近[7]放着那个人东西的储藏柜的。[8]一点都不能体会[9]她妈妈[10]的感受[11]……[12]

Sentence.Original: [0]What do you mean? Didn't she write you that[1]letter?[2]Well...[3]There's not a mother in this world who doesn't[4]want their child to be happy.[5]Yeah...[6]When she came back home, after her first[7]marriage collapsed...[8]The poor little thing was in tatters. She didn't[9]trust a soul.[10]Not even me - her own mother![11]But then, surrounded by the natural beauty of[12]Lake Juliet she slowly started to heal,[13]and finally she could stand on her own two feet.[14]I was so happy.[15]And then that man came. He went and fell in[16]love with her.[17]At first, she wouldn't even give him the time of[18]day - and darn right too.[19]She had no more faith in love, or being loved.[20]But he wouldn't quit, and somehow...[21]Somehow, she grew to love him back.[22]Why didn't you want them to get married?[23]I didn't ever want to see Olivia in that state[24]again. I didn't want her to give up on life.[25]And I wouldn't let myself trust that man.[26]I couldn't let myself trust him.[27]A man like that, who had just tired of his city[28]life and come out here on a whim.[29]Right...[30]
Sentence.Translation: [0]可是她不是给你写了这封信[1]吗？[2]唉……[3]这个世界上哪有不希望子女[4]幸福的母亲。[5]是啊……[6]当她第一次婚姻破裂，回到家[7]的时候……[8]这可怜的小东西精神萎靡。根本不相信[9]这世上还有真情。[10]甚至对我——她母亲的关爱都无动于衷！[11]后来朱丽叶湖的美丽风光逐渐[12]治愈了她内心的伤痛，[13]她终于重拾了生活的信心。[14]我当时是多么高兴啊。[15]接着那个男人就出现了。他爱上了[16]奥利维亚。[17]一开始她根本不给那个男人留一点[18]机会。[19]她已经不再能爱人和被爱了。[20]可是他没有放弃，结果……[21]结果，她回报了他的爱。[22]为什么你不希望他们结婚？[23]我绝不想再看到奥利维亚陷入那种[24]悲痛。我不希望她放弃生活的信念。[25]我不会信任那个男人。[26]我不能信任他。[27]像他那种厌倦了大城市的生活[28]想出来换换口味的男人。[29]没错……[30]
